entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
